https://tmrev.io/movie/66767-Beat the World 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nZCPl2Du2PRkky4Mzb4YiXk9C1Q.jpg Three dance crews – one Latin American, one European and one Canadian – prepare to battle at the International Beat the World competition in Detroit. Along the way, they struggle with gambling debt, bad break-ups and their own egos. In the final showdown to become world champions they find that their lifelong hopes, dreams and even lives, are at stake. Beat the World
